page.title: 07THE METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: {The Methodist Church}in Stoke is very active. Although the membership is only 25, there are on average 50 _ 60 people worshipping eah Sunday, from the very young to over 80 yrs. Services take place in the small hall, refurbished as a chapel two years ago. The large hall, the former chapel, is now used for Sunday School clsses and some of the mid_week activities. The New International Version of the Bible is used and hymns are taken from the Methodist Hymn Book but increasingly songs from "Songs of Fellowship" are being used. Weekday activities include a fellowship and prayer meeting, youth fellowship, guitar, youth and junior youth clubs. The Methodist Chapel houses a lively growing Christian Fellowship.
